title: A Very Funny Threesome
description: Three short stories about witches, nuns, and Jesus Christ that are guaranteed to make you smile, chuckle, and even laugh out loud. Indeed, its best you don't be drinking milk when you read them lest you laugh so hard the milk runs out your nose. WARNING: THESE ARE ADULT STORIES AND ARE NOT SUITABLE FOR PEOPLE UNDER 18 YEARS OF AGE.
author: Darrin Mason
